name: Great Northern Theater-Style Popcorn Packs
description: If you just purchased one our new popcorn machines or are looking for that great theater taste in your existing machine, stop looking! This is great tasting, high-volume popcorn that pops up fluffy time and time again. We truly believe it is the best popcorn in the USA.Pre-portioned packs with pre-measured amounts of oil, corn and seasoningsReal theater tasteEasy to open, pour and popHighest quality popcorn grown in USA
